DOC.brief_summary: This is an open-label, multi-center, long-term, (open-ended) safety study with 125 mg per day of azimilide in patients who completed protocol 2000098.
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Safety of 125 mg Per Day of Oral Azimilide in Patients With Implantable Cardioverter Defibrillator (ICDs)
DOC.criteria: patients who completed at least 12 months on study 2000098 before inclusion in this study breast feeding or plan to become pregnant used ticlopidine were taking Class I or other Class III drugs
